'''1.19 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.19-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.19]], released on June 2, 2022,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-19-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.19 Release Candidate 1|June 2, 2022}}</ref> which fixes a bug related to [[Darkness]] effect.
